医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员发现一种蛋白质在提醒身体注意细菌感染方面发挥着关键作用由马萨诸塞州总医院 (MGH) 的研究人员领导的研究小组发现了一种蛋白质，它在提醒身体注意细菌感染并启动有效的免疫反应以抵抗入侵方面发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Researchers-discover-a- Protein-that-plays-ritic-roles-in-alerting-the-body-to-a-bacterial-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Researchers-discover-a- Protein-that-plays-ritic-roles-in-alerting-the-body-to-a-bacterial-infection.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82d86479-da17-4cb4-a865-273a19d5e1b6 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 00:02:12 -0400 Researchers discover a protein that plays critical roles in alerting the body to a bacterial infection
芯片实验室技术提供了评估储存红细胞的新方法第一作者是医学和外科工程中心 (CEMS) 研究员 Ziya Isiksacan 博士，马萨诸塞州总医院 CEMS 研究员、哈佛医学院外科副教授 Osman Berk Usta 博士School 是《美国国家科学院院刊》上发表的一项新研究的资深作者，《通过精密输血医学芯片实验室技术评估储存的红细胞》。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Lab-on-a-chip-technologies-offer-new-ways-to-assess-stored-red-blood-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Lab-on-a-chip-technologies-offer-new-ways-to-assess-stored-red-blood-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66f038df-5efe-4bb1-95c9-a5f645c88112 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 23:13:25 -0400 Lab-on-a-chip technologies offer new ways to assess stored red blood cells
患有阿尔茨海默病风险基因的人可能会失去较早察觉气味的能力一项发表的研究表明，携带与阿尔茨海默病风险最强相关的基因变异的人可能比不携带该基因变异的人更早失去检测气味的能力，这可能是未来记忆和思维问题的早期迹象。 2023 年 7 月 26 日，美国神经病学学会医学杂志 Neurology® 在线期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/People-with-Alzheimers-risk-gene-may-lose-ability-to-detect-odors-earlier.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/People-with-Alzheimers-risk-gene-may-lose-ability-to-detect-odors-earlier.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6a2fab9-e1f2-44d5-b195-da778f053fa7 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 23:08:28 -0400 People with Alzheimer's risk gene may lose ability to detect odors earlier
专家权衡新阿尔茨海默病疗法的益处和风险针对早期阿尔茨海默病的新疗法，即消除大脑中β淀粉样蛋白斑块的单克隆抗体，为生活受到该疾病影响的人们带来了希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Experts-weigh-benefits-and-risks-of-new-Alzheimers-disease-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Experts-weigh-benefits-and-risks-of-new-Alzheimers-disease-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87e76382-ecb6-4e0e-8ebc-2724d0da8655 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 23:05:55 -0400 Experts weigh benefits and risks of new Alzheimer's disease therapies
英国皇家学院从药品和医疗器械公司获得数百万美元的营销费用《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项调查发现，自 2015 年以来，英国皇家学院已从药品和医疗器械公司收到超过 900 万英镑的营销付款，但并不总是公开披露这些付款。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Royal-colleges-in-the-UK-receive-millions-in-marketing- payments-from-drug-and-medical-device-companies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Royal-colleges-in-the-UK-receive-millions-in-marketing- payments-from-drug-and-medical-device-companies.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad573c0f-264b-4c33-950c-8edfa083af42 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 22:54:27 -0400 Royal colleges in the UK receive millions in marketing payments from drug and medical device companies
昆达里尼瑜伽可能对患有阿尔茨海默病风险因素的老年女性有益加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的一项研究表明，昆达里尼瑜伽是一种专注于呼吸、冥想和心理想象的瑜伽形式，对于患有阿尔茨海默氏症风险因素和担心记忆力下降的老年女性似乎有益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Kundalini-yoga-may-be-beneficial-for-older-women-with-Alzheimers-risk-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Kundalini-yoga-may-be-beneficial-for-older-women-with-Alzheimers-risk-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=540ed927-63f9-476e-afa6-1858dce5ace1 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 22:47:34 -0400 Kundalini yoga may be beneficial for older women with Alzheimer's risk factors
两次输注表达 IL-15 的 CAR NK 细胞可提高淋巴瘤小鼠模型的存活率德克萨斯大学MD安德森癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，嵌合抗原受体（CAR）自然杀伤（NK）细胞代谢适应性的丧失是抵抗的一个关键机制，输注的细胞逐渐失去与其他细胞竞争的能力。肿瘤细胞获取营养，导致肿瘤复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Two-infusions-of-IL-15-expressing-CAR-NK-Cells-boost-survival-in-lymphoma-mouse-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Two-infusions-of-IL-15-expressing-CAR-NK-Cells-boost-survival-in-lymphoma-mouse-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a57fc292-e706-4ba3-a356-d6bf2292afc8 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 22:42:46 -0400 Two infusions of IL-15-expressing CAR NK Cells boost survival in lymphoma mouse models
Claudin-2 蛋白帮助幼鼠从母乳中吸收更多钙根据《功能》杂志上的一项新研究，一种被称为claudin-2的关键蛋白质排列在幼年小鼠的肠上皮细胞上，可以帮助它们从母乳中吸收更多的钙。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Claudin-2- Protein-helps-infant-mice-absorb-more-calcium-from-breast-milk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Claudin-2- Protein-helps-infant-mice-absorb-more-calcium-from-breast-milk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3688d537-bb2f-45c2-a3e5-b3c826da1ffd Wed, 26 Jul 2023 22:39:07 -0400 Claudin-2 protein helps infant mice absorb more calcium from breast milk
更多措施可改善心力衰竭患者的健康人们更经常使用智能手表等消费类可穿戴设备来监测他们的健康和身体活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/More-steps-linked-to-improved-health-for-heart-failure-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/More-steps-linked-to-improved-health-for-heart-failure-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f413d743-d33a-42e8-8532-b7ef4d07a4ab Wed, 26 Jul 2023 22:37:54 -0400 More steps linked to improved health for heart failure patients
KIAA0930可能成为癌症恶病质的新治疗靶点2023 年 7 月 20 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“未表征的转录本 KIAA0930 赋予癌细胞恶病质表型”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/KIAA0930-could-be-a-novel-therapeutic-target-for-cancer-cachexia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/KIAA0930-could-be-a-novel-therapeutic-target-for-cancer-cachexia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cdc83c6-f89c-4400-94a6-5121dc414a9a Wed, 26 Jul 2023 22:36:54 -0400 KIAA0930 could be a novel therapeutic target for cancer cachexia
